name: 2048-ish
description: A re-creation of the popular 2048 game.

scripts.build-dev: node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/webpack build --env NODE_ENV=development --mode development
scripts.serve-dev: node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/webpack serve --env NODE_ENV=development --mode development
scripts.build-prod: node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack build --env NODE_ENV=production --mode production
scripts.serve-prod: node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack serve --env NODE_ENV=production --mode production

author: Jesse Z
